project.title: Memory
project.intro: Find pairs as fast as possible in this Memory!
chall: Array.splice to remove a certain array element
setInterval & clearInterval for the timer of the game
Click event listener on parent to handle children clicks
CSS user-select to remove mouse selection

relatedLinks.title: Shop
relatedLinks.intro: Shop app built with React, Redux, Styled-components, Node and MongoDB.
chall: Backend server with Node.js, Express and MongoDB
Fetch data from the backend with Axios
Redux & Redux persist to handle states accross the app
Testing with Jest and React Testing Library

relatedLinks.title: Black Jack
relatedLinks.intro: Beat the bank in Black Jack!
chall: While loop to ensure unique card draws
Local storage to save the player score
Complex logic to handle win-lose logic
